snippet: The July reading of 54.2 in the official purchasing managers' index for nonmanufacturing was the weakest since January but still pointed to growth.
lead_paragraph: The July reading of 54.2 in the official purchasing managers' index for nonmanufacturing was the weakest since January but still pointed to growth.

headline.main: Growth Slows a Bit in Chinese Services Sector
headline.print_headline: Growth Slows a Bit in Chinese Services Sector
